title: VR-Based Scientific Inquiry and Laboratory Safety Game Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of core concepts and intermediate-level application skills
context.additional_context: Experiential learning course combining VR games and scaffolding in a non-face-to-face environment. Students acquire knowledge by simulating scientific methodologies and laboratory safety protocols in virtual reality.

learning_goals: Students can explain the five steps of the scientific methodology (problem definition, hypothesis formulation, experimental design, data analysis, conclusion drawing) with over 85% accuracy
Students achieve over 90% compliance with experimental equipment usage and safety rules in VR simulations
Students demonstrate a 30% or greater improvement in science knowledge scores in post-assessments compared to pre-assessments
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
